name: 1(2) ENG IDLE
description:
Warning triggered only with aircraft on ground.

Take-Off commenced with associated engine at IDLE, OR associated ENG MODE knob at IDLE and collective not fully down, OR engine in APU mode.

procedure.text: + Audio tone and 'ENGINE ONE (TWO) IDLE' voice warning.

procedure.heading: IF ENG 1 is set to APU:
procedure.text:
- ENG 1 MODE knob: set to IDLE.
- ENG 1 ACC switch: set to MAIN.
When ENG ACCESSORY MODE advisory clears and ENG ACC TRAN advisory shows, then when ENG ACC TRAN advisory clears on MFD ENGINE page, confirm actuator position fully engaged.
- ENG 1 MODE knob: set to FLT.

procedure.heading: IF ENG 1(2) MODE knob at IDLE:
procedure.text:
- Check ENG ACCESSORY MODE and ENG APU MODE advisory lights extinguished.
- ENG 1(2) MODE knob: set to FLT.
